html: Today, with a wide range of feelings, I'm announcing my retirement from basketball. IMMENSE GRATITUDE to everyone (family, friends, teammates, coaches, staff, fans) involved in my life in the last 23 years. It's been a fabulous journey. Way beyond my wildest dreams.pic.twitter.com/3MLCUtmd6K
text: Today, with a wide range of feelings, I'm announcing my retirement from basketball. IMMENSE GRATITUDE to everyone (family, friends, teammates, coaches, staff, fans) involved in my life in the last 23 years. It's been a fabulous journey. Way beyond my wildest dreams.pic.twitter.com/3MLCUtmd6K

html: Con una gran mezcla de emociones les cuento que decidí retirarme del básquet. ENORME GRATITUD para mi familia, amigos, compañeros, DTs, staff, aficionados y todos los que fueron parte de mi vida en estos 23 años. Fue un viaje fabuloso que superó cualquier tipo de sueño. GRACIAS!pic.twitter.com/FtFqpTwFRq

html: From the book "Why We Sleep: Unlocking the Power of Sleep and Dreams" by @sleepdiplomat : "After being awake for nineteen hours, people who were sleep-deprived were as cognitively impaired as those who were legally drunk."
text: From the book "Why We Sleep: Unlocking the Power of Sleep and Dreams" by @sleepdiplomat : "After being awake for nineteen hours, people who were sleep-deprived were as cognitively impaired as those who were legally drunk."

html: Me acota mi apuntadora (?) que hace justo 20 años, un flaquito alto de nariz prominente salía desde Bahía Blanca con sus padres rumbo a Reggio Calabria. Dicen que el pibito estaba lleno de ilusiones y muy entusiasmado por empezar su carrera europea.
text: Me acota mi apuntadora (?) que hace justo 20 años, un flaquito alto de nariz prominente salía desde Bahía Blanca con sus padres rumbo a Reggio Calabria. Dicen que el pibito estaba lleno de ilusiones y muy entusiasmado por empezar su carrera europea.

html: Now that NBA is over for us, I'm back on TW. Thanks everybody for the support and kind words! Unusual but very emotionally rewarding season. Ahora que terminó para nosotros la temporada, vuelvo a TW. Gracias a todos por la onda y apoyo!
text:
Now that NBA is over for us, I'm back on TW. Thanks everybody for the support and kind words! Unusual but very emotionally rewarding season.
Ahora que terminó para nosotros la temporada, vuelvo a TW. Gracias a todos por la onda y apoyo!

html: My hypothesis on Luca's list: 1. Danny (makes many 3s & has a 10' long boa at home! Loves him!!) 2. Vince (bros have been watching his dunks on Youtube) 3. MJ (bros keep saying he's the GOAT +SpaceJam) 4. Bryn (I'm dumbfounded!!) 5. LA (always Spurs' leading scorer when he asks)
text:
My hypothesis on Luca's list:
1. Danny (makes many 3s & has a 10' long boa at home! Loves him!!)
2. Vince (bros have been watching his dunks on Youtube)
3. MJ (bros keep saying he's the GOAT +SpaceJam)
4. Bryn (I'm dumbfounded!!)
5. LA (always Spurs' leading scorer when he asks)
